name: Alpha Sea
description:
Alpha Sea, an oil rig company that is located in the Persian Gulf. Your goal is to survive and rescue the others who are trapped within the rig. You can do this with your trusty fire-axe which allows you to break through destructible objects. With the use of puzzle solving you can also find other ways to navigate the rig, these include, vent-crawling, making holes in certain walls, finding a keycard to grant access to a higher clearance area.

key Features

  • networked Destructible Physics.
  • achivements That Unlock Player Cosmetics.
  • network Support Up to 10 Players.
  • Uses a simple but yet effective player movement code to allow players in Single Player mode to speedrun the game, with the use of movement tricks like jump boosting and player trimping.
  • Steam leaderboards that show a score at the end of a run, while runs are randomly generated there will be a weekly rotation of a map with a random seed.
  • Random placement of certain rooms and items, these are still on the same floor but could appear in any order.
